item.title: Journey With Hugo
item.description: upgrade time For some time now my personal website and portfolio had consisted entirely of cumbersome, custom html and css. From a design and functionality standpoint, there was not much there. The design was neither simple and clean, nor was it dynamic and interesting. A single html page with no real means of adding content. I would not call myself a writer, but I knew I wanted something like a small blog on my website; to collect ideas, share what I am learning, etc.
